title: Predicate Functions on Dictionary Properties
description: In Python, we can create functions that take in a dictionary and apply a predicate function to a specified property of the dictionary. This can be useful in scenarios where we need to check if a certain condition is met for a specific property of a dictionary.

meta.title: Predicate Functions on Dictionary Properties
meta.description: Explore how to create functions that apply predicate logic to dictionary properties in Python.
meta.keywords: python, dictionary, predicate function, property, lambda
